titleStmt.title: A modern account of Scotland being an exact description of the country, and a true character of the people and their manners / written from thence by an English gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Kirke, Thomas, 1650-1706.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Kirke by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
The DNB states that this work is a satire.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
